Content: The reward recipients is also working...

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: You can set any amount of address and percents, it can handle them. It adds the reward address to the sendmany with a for loop. Was quite simple to fix once I figured out how to code it in javascript lol.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I dont like it excatly, as it calcualtes things multiple times for no reason, but it works and is accurate enough that its paying out starting from a clean pool wallet with zero balance and keeps paying out. Will need to update ZEX pool soon, will increase NH mindiff too, 50 is too low.

Content: Also changed the gencfg.sh script, to take a $1 of a specific coin, and updated the coins.json template to use disablecb by  default, and also enabled payments by default in poolcongifs.template.
